html:
With ample screen real estate in the thin-and-light chassis, Apple's 15-inch MacBook Air is great for traveling — made even better by a steeper price drop on Amazon this weekend.

Amazon has some of the top MacBook Air deals available this May, but the steeper $165 price drop on the 15-inch M4/24GB/512GB spec in Starlight is especially enticing. With the extra memory (24GB vs 16GB found in the standard model), you can enjoy enhanced performance when running multiple apps simultaneously.

Save $165 on Amazon

You can pick up the upgraded model for $1,434 (10% off) in the elegant Starlight finish, but if you have your heart set on another colorway, you can spend a few bucks more with sale prices ringing in at $1,449.

If you're looking for the cheapest price period across the range, 13-inch M4 models have fallen to as low as $849 or $1,049 for the standard 15-inch spec at Apple resellers.

Weekend MacBook Air savings

  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (8C GPU, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $849 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (10C GPU, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,049 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (10C GPU, 24GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,249 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB RAM, 256GB SSD): $1,049 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD): $1,249 ($150 off) at Amazon and B&H
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (24GB RAM, 512GB SSD) in Starlight: $1,434 ($165 off) at Amazon
